welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Florsheim, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this historic city, known for its picturesque vineyards and quaint streets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Florsheim has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Air Base Airport serves as a base for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
